abstract: The job status of Keith Banks, the Bank of America executive in charge of U.S. Trust and the asset manager Columbia Management, was unclear Thursday, with one published report suggesting he might leave his position and another saying he was leaving.
snippet: The job status of Keith Banks, the Bank of America executive in charge of U.S. Trust and the asset manager Columbia Management, was unclear Thursday, with one published report suggesting he might leave his position and another saying he was leavin...
lead_paragraph: The job status of Keith Banks, the Bank of America executive in charge of U.S. Trust and the asset manager Columbia Management, was unclear on Thursday, with one published report suggesting he might leave his position and another saying he would leave.

headline.main: Job Status of a Top BofA Exec Unclear, Reports Say

abstract: Bank of America Merrill Lynch said Friday that it has hired Benjamin Perkins, the head of Pacific Growth Equities’ life sciences investment banking team, as a managing director in its San Francisco office.
snippet: Bank of America Merrill Lynch said Friday that it has hired Benjamin Perkins, the head of Pacific Growth Equities’ life sciences investment banking team, as a managing director in its San Francisco office.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America Merrill Lynch said Friday that it had hired Benjamin Perkins, the head of Pacific Growth Equities‘ life sciences investment banking team, as a managing director in its San Francisco office.

headline.main: Merrill Hires Life Sciences Investment Banker

abstract: Bank of America chief executive Kenneth D. Lewis may be facing more calls for his ouster because of the controversy following the firm’s acquisition of Merrill Lynch, but one well-known banking analyst has come to his defense.
snippet: Bank of America chief executive Kenneth D. Lewis may be facing more calls for his ouster because of the controversy following the firm’s acquisition of Merrill Lynch, but one well-known banking analyst has come to his defense.
lead_paragraph: Is Kenneth D. Lewis, the embattled chief executive of Bank of America, getting a bum rap?

headline.main: A Defense of Bank of America’s Chief
